Marmaduke Arundel "Duke" Wetherell (1883 - 25 Febụwarị 1939) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye na-achụ nta nnukwu egwuregwu.
N'afọ 1930, Marmaduke gara Loch Ness ịchọ anụ ọhịa Loch Ness
Wetherell kwuru na ọ chọtara akara ụkwụ, mana mgbe e zigara ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị akara ụkwụ maka nnyocha ha bịara bụrụ nke enyí mmiri; onye na-eme ihe ọchị ejirila nche anwụ nke ụkwụ enyí mmiri.
A mụrụ ya na Bodmin, Cornwall, Wetherell rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ndị Britain na South Africa n'oge a na-adịghị ekwu okwu
N'afọ 1920, ọ malitere imepụta na iduzi ihe nkiri mana ha enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma. Ọ mepụtara, duzie ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na mmepụta ya nke Livingstone (1925) na Robinson Crusoe (1927)
Akụkọ ndụ Lawrence nke Arabia nke a na-akpọ Revolt in the Desert nke Freddie Young sere foto ya bụ onye sere ihe nkiri agha ya The Somme (1927) na Victory (1928) emeghị.
Ọ bụ ya kpatara aghụghọ "foto dọkịta na-awa ahụ" nke Loch Ness Monster.
Ọ bụ nna onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ian Colin.
